scripts.postinstall: npm run link-modules && npm run install-module-dependencies
scripts.lint: jshint packages/ system-test/ test/ && jscs packages/ system-test/ test/
scripts.test: npm run docs && mocha test/docs.js packages/*/test/*.js
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --no-timeouts --bail packages/*/test/*.js -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
